location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Gideon Colquhoun, Assistant in Charge at Bussora [Basra] to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Gideon Colquhoun, Assistant in Charge at Bussora [Basra], to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a packet to the President in Council at Bombay, containing information on the abdication of Buonaparte [Napoleon Bonaparte], the Restoration of the Bourbon Family in France and the re-establishment of peace in Europe.
